00025 #include <inttypes.h>
00026 #include "transceiver_spi.h"
00027 #include "transceiver_mac.h"
00028 
00029 #ifdef DEBUG_MAC
00030 #include "uart.h"
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 unsigned char mc13192_mode;
00034 unsigned char mc13192_state;
00035 
00036 void MC13192_init()
00037 {
00038         write_to_spi(0x00, 0x0000); //RESET
00039         
00040         /* MC13192 v2.2 register settings */
00041         write_to_spi(0x1B,0x8000);      /* Disable TC1. */
00042         write_to_spi(0x1D,0x8000);      /* Disable TC2. */
00043         write_to_spi(0x1F,0x8000);      /* Disable TC3. */
00044         write_to_spi(0x21,0x8000);      /* Disable TC4. */
00045         write_to_spi(0x07,0x0E00);      /* Enable CLKo in Doze */
00046         write_to_spi(0x0C,0x0300);      /* IRQ pull-up disable. */
00047         read_from_spi(0x25);            /* Sets the reset indicator bit */
00048         write_to_spi(0x04,0xA08D);      /* LR ADDED New cal value */
00049         write_to_spi(0x08,0xFFF7);      /* Preferred injection */
00050         write_to_spi(0x05,0x8351);      /* Acoma, TC1, Doze, ATTN masks, LO1, CRC */
00051         write_to_spi(0x06,0x4720);      /* CCA, TX, RX, energy detect */
00052         /* Read the status register to clear any undesired IRQs. */
00053         read_from_spi(0x24);            /* Clear the status register, if set */
00054         mc13192_mode = MC13192_IDLE; /* Update global variable to reflect MC13192 status */
00055         mc13192_state = NO_PACKET;      /* Update global variable to reflect MC13192 status */
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 void MC13192_update_state(void)
00060         {
00061 
00062         int buffer;
00063                                 
00064         buffer = read_from_spi(0x24);
00065         
00066         switch (buffer)
00067                 {
00068                 case 0x81 :
00069                         mc13192_state = RX_PACKET;
00070                         break;
00071                 case 0x40 :
00072                         mc13192_state = TX_PACKET;
00073                         break;
00074                 case 0x00 :
00075                         mc13192_state = NO_PACKET;
00076                         break;
00077                 default :
00078                         mc13192_state = DROP_PACKET;
00079                         break;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 
00083 
00084 void cca_modus(void)
00085         {
00086         uint16_t buffer;
00087         
00088         #ifdef DEBUG_MAC
00089                 char buf[64]; /* buffer for debug output */
00090         #endif
00091         
00092         /**************************** CCA MODUS ************************************/
00093 
00094         buffer = read_from_spi( 0x06);  // CCA MODE Aktivieren
00095         buffer = buffer|(1);
00096         buffer = buffer&~(2);
00097         write_to_spi(0x06, buffer);     //Frequency
00098 
00099         buffer = read_from_spi( 0x06);  // CCA TYPE CLEAR CHANNEL ASSESSMENT
00100         buffer = buffer|(1<<4);
00101         buffer = buffer&~(1<<5);
00102         write_to_spi(0x06, buffer); 
00103 
00104         buffer = read_from_spi( 0x29);  //read signal strenght
00105         buffer = buffer & (0x00FF);
00106         buffer = buffer / (-2);
00107         
00108         #ifdef DEBUG_MAC        
00109                 snprintf(buf,64,"Read Register 0x29 %d\n",buffer ); 
00110                 uart_puts(buf);
00111         #endif  
00112         /**************************** CCA MODUS ENDE ********************************/
00113         }
00114 
00115  
00116 void init_rx_pkt_mode(void)
00117         {
00118         write_to_spi(0x06, 0x0122);
00119         }
00120  
00121 
00122 int get_rx_pkt(rx_packet_t *rx_packet)
00123         {
00124         rx_packet->dataLength = read_from_spi( 0x25 )-2;
00125         rx_packet->dataLength = rx_packet->dataLength&0x007F;
00126         read_from_ram( 0x01, rx_packet);
00127         
00128         return 1;
00129         }
00130         
00131 
00132 int tx_pkt_mode( tx_packet_t *tx_packet)
00133         {
00134         int buffer;
00135 
00136         if( tx_packet->dataLength > 125 )
00137                 {
00138                 return 0;
00139                 }
00140 
00141         buffer = tx_packet->dataLength+2; //Paket Laenge +2 Bytes fuer Checksumme 
00142         write_to_spi(0x03, buffer);
00143         
00144         write_to_ram(0x02, tx_packet);  //Daten ins Packet RAM laden
00145         write_to_spi(0x06, 0x0203);     //Sende Modus + Interrupt aktivieren
00146         
00147         return 1;       
00148         }
